items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any user, all other users see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are synchronized across web and mobile platforms without requiring a manual refresh.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates should have a latency of less than 2 seconds.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to discuss tasks and projects.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within project-specific chat rooms.
Chat history is stored and accessible for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Chat messages should be delivered with less than 1 second latency.
System should support at least 100 active chat participants per project.

notes: User requirement was high-level and vague; assumed core collaboration features include real-time task updates and integrated chat. Additional features like file sharing, notifications, and permissions may be needed.
